czone.scene.scene module¶

Scene Class Luis Rangel DaCosta

class czone.scene.scene.Scene(bounds=None, objects=None)¶

Bases: object

add_object(ob)¶
property all_atoms¶
property all_species¶
property ase_atoms¶
property bounds¶
property checks¶
get_priorities()¶
property objects¶
populate()¶

First, every object populates atoms against its own boundaries

Then, gather the list of priorities from all the objects For each object:

  1. Generate a True array of length ob.atoms

  2. For each object in the same priority level or lower, perform

    interiority check and repeatedly perform logical_and to see if atoms belong in scene

-> Lower priority numbers supercede objects with high priority numbers -> Objects on the same priority level will not supply atoms to the scene

in their volume intersections

species_from_object(idx)¶
